body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value as T0_observation_free_text,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value as T0_observation_quantity,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0006]/value as T0_observation_count,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0008]/value as T0_observation_coded_text,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0017]/value as T0_observation_date_time,
  a/protocol[at0018]/items[at0019]/value as T0_observation_boolean,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value as T0_evaluation_free_text,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/value as T0_evaluation_quantity,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/value as T0_evaluation_count,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0010]/value as T0_evaluation_coded_text,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0015]/value as T0_evaluation_date_time,
  b/protocol[at0016]/items[at0017]/value as T0_evaluation_boolean,
  d/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0003]/value as T0_instruction_free_text,
  d/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0004]/value as T0_instruction_quantity,
  d/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0005]/value as T0_instruction_count,
  d/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0007]/value as T0_instruction_coded_text,
  d/activities[at0001]/description[at0002]/items[at0017]/value as T0_instruction_date_time,
  d/protocol[at0016]/items[at0018]/value as T0_instruction_boolean,
  f/description[at0001]/items[at0002]/value as T0_action_free_text,
  f/description[at0001]/items[at0003]/value as T0_action_quantity,
  f/description[at0001]/items[at0004]/value as T0_action_count,
  f/description[at0001]/items[at0006]/value as T0_action_coded_text,
  f/description[at0001]/items[at0007]/value as T0_action_date_time,
  f/protocol[at0008]/items[at0009]/value as T0_action_boolean
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.observation_archetype.v0]
    and EVALUATION b[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.evaluation_archetype.v0]
    and INSTRUCTION d[openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.instruction_archetype.v0]
    and ACTION f[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.action_archetype.v0]
  )
LIMIT
  1
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
